metadata.title: RICKYOUNG Just A Girl Who Loves Frogs Cute Green Frog Costume Fleece Flannel Lightweight Blankets Plush Microfiber Bedding Throw Blanket for Couch and Bed 40"x30" for Pet
features: High Quality Material:It is made of flannel , this super soft throw blanket will help to keep you warm and cozy. Double-side design offers you different senses of softness.This throw blanket is lightweight and soft.
Perfect For All-seasons: Our line design blankets are both warming and breathable. They will keep you warm in winter and chilly summer nights. Hence, they are perfect for year-round comfort.

Multi-Purpose: Throw this over your bed to enjoy a relaxing nap or your living room’s couch while watching your favorite TV show; it’s also your perfect partner for winter camping, backpacking or for use in an air-conditioned room.
EASY CARE - Machine washable and dry for hassle-free care. Machine wash with cold water, tumble dry on low heat. never use bleach
Best After-Sales Service: RICKYOUNG provides worry-free after-sales service for every buyer. Please contact us for your best shopping experience if you got any question.
description: The flannel fabric we choose is originally made from 100% microfiber polyester and brushed to create extra softness on both sides, and the pattern offers a unique silhouette and modern look, making it more decorative.

The throw we offered is designed to be simple but elegant, featuring a double-faced plush with soft touch and graceful luster, so you could easily coordinate with existing bedding as well as adding a touch of class, warmth and spice to your home decor.

RICKYOUNG Flannel Fleece Blanket brings soft and comfort for an afternoon nap in bed or couch, perfect for indoor and outdoor use to provide constant warmth in chilly weather. Ensure ultimate fluffy soft with our flannel fleece blanket throw all year round, whether it's summer or winter.
The flannel felt has a comfortable quality fabric, soft and skin-friendly, delicate and smooth, and it is a blanket that feels like being in nature.
RICKYOUNG Throw Blankets Are Made From Microfiber Plush Material,Lightweight Fleece Flannel Throw Blanket Brings You Warmth And Not Feel Too Hot.All Season For Use.
